revised_title: Observations on Tides and Their Variations near Plymouth
tldr: The author, Samuel Colepresse, provides detailed observations and measurements of tides near Plymouth in 1667. He discusses the relationship between the height of tides, the phases of the moon, and the strength of winds. Colepresse also notes the variation in tidal heights during different times of the year and the importance of these observations for understanding tides in other locations.
